DataElement.preferredName: Unexplained Skin Rash Diarrhea Dry eye Reaction Occurrence Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator whether there are any reactions as rash, diarrhea, dry eyes occurred.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Unexplained Skin Rash Diarrhea Dry eye Reaction Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Having a reason or cause that is not known._Any change in the skin which affects its appearance or texture. A rash may be localized to one part of the body, or affect all the skin. Rashes may cause the skin to change color, itch, become warm, bumpy, dry, cracked or blistered, swell and may be painful._A disorder characterized by frequent and watery bowel movements._A disorder characterized by dryness of the cornea and conjunctiva._A response generated by a stimulus._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Unexplained Skin Rash Diarrhea Dry eye Reaction
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Having a reason or cause that is not known.:Any change in the skin which affects its appearance or texture. A rash may be localized to one part of the body, or affect all the skin. Rashes may cause the skin to change color, itch, become warm, bumpy, dry, cracked or blistered, swell and may be painful.:A disorder characterized by frequent and watery bowel movements.:A disorder characterized by dryness of the cornea and conjunctiva.:A response generated by a stimulus.

Concepts.definition: Having a reason or cause that is not known.

Any change in the skin which affects its appearance or texture. A rash may be localized to one part of the body, or affect all the skin. Rashes may cause the skin to change color, itch, become warm, bumpy, dry, cracked or blistered, swell and may be painful.
A disorder characterized by frequent and watery bowel movements.
A disorder characterized by dryness of the cornea and conjunctiva.
A response generated by a stimulus.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
